attributes.action: convince McDONALDS to deliver food to your door
attributes.additional_details:
Mcdonalds should home deliver. mcdonalds is a fast food chain enjoyed by millions worldwide especially children with their `happy meals` but not everyone can get to the restaurants especially disabled children/adults the elderly and children with life threatning illnesses like cancer lukemia or meningitis .

we the undersigned call for Mcdonalds to do home deliveries so happy meals can become "happy meals on wheels" not only will mcdonalds earn so much more money but they would be making ill/disabled children genuinely "happy"
